LanguageData.RV2_EADD_Text_PathInvalidConflictingDesi: Path conflicts and prey designations forbid
LanguageData.RV2_EADD_Text_ConflictingPathResolutionS: {PREDATOR} has switched vore goal for {PREY} to {NEWGOAL} because {OLDGOAL} conflicted with another active path.
LanguageData.RV2_EADD_Text_AccidentalDigestionNotific: {PREDATOR} has accidentally switched to fatal goal {GOAL} for their prey {PREY}!
LanguageData.RV2_EADD_Text_AccidentalDigestionAbort: {PREDATOR} realized they were accidentally digesting their prey, and has switched back to endo.
LanguageData.RV2_EADD_Text_AccidentalDigestionAbortFa: {PREDATOR} realized they were accidentally digesting their prey, but could not switch back to endo because digestion has already progressed too far.
